name: Mixed Shooter
description:
Simple bullet hell/ top down shooter.  With a twist every 10 seconds the game has a effected mixed into it. some are helpful like taking damage gives you points instead. And some ore not to good like killing a enemy reduces your score. To the worst thing possible reversed controls or not being able to fire at  all.

can you get the highest score on the leader board?

sadly I was unable to finish my 2nd type of enemy before the game jam time ended. and never did fix my pause menu it locks up for some reason and does not let you click buttons. Will fix these things and upload after the jam
